formalText: We discussed how with his recent projects he overweights it then feels helpless and then he kind of freaks out a little bit and it does make things more difficult.
Told Cameron that I don't think he has enough self confidence when it comes to a lot of things which we discussed working on.
The patient is experiencing some of the symptoms of his ADD
He has been feeling anxious and confused.
He has been feeling a bit overwhelmed and helpless with projects for his kids
where they are building a bumper car from a template.
He decided against taking the Adderal yesterday for his ADD because he thought it would  motivate him to do something.
He definitely can tell the difference not too long after taking it and took it before the appointment
Yesterday, he felt crappy all day
His sports team lost which affected his mood some but felt lonely with nothing to do.
He feels kind of crummy about himself as a result of his lack of confidence.
He threw up his Chinese food this morning which altered his medication
